extendedInfo.description: â âGreat game play, fun story line, stunning graphics and adorable charactersâ 5/5 â AppyZilla â âA virtually flawless touch-screen game.â 91/100 - ArcadeLife â âDraw Breaker is a hilarious game that is expertly created and a complete and utter joy to play.â 9/10 â App-Score â âDraw Breaker combines a refreshing new outlook, challenging and strategic gameplay, gorgeous visuals, and quirky music into one complete package.â â AppAdvice â âItâs a delightful, addictive little game that will frustrate and delight you in equal measures but is sure to keep you coming back for more.â â TechnoDaily â âDraw Breaker is a new way of playing âbreakoutâ-like games, and is probably the best of its kindâ 4.7/5 â The Apple Tree â âFrom the menus to the cut scenes to the actual gameplay there is a level of polish that is a pleasure to play.â 8.9/10 â Gamer Chica â âWhether gamers are a big fan of the classic brick breaker game or they need something new to play, theyâre sure to fall in love with itâ 4.5/5 â Apps on Tapp The future of the world is at stake! Professor Blockowski and his block army are on a campaign to make the world square. Your mission will require quick reflexes and fast thinking to foil Professor Blockowskiâs evil schemes and keep the world safe and round.AMAZING PHYSICSDraw Breaker takes the classic brick breaker genre, but adds a TWISTâyou control the ball by DRAWING PLATFORMS. You have complete freedom to aim your shots by drawing platforms at any angle. Create shots that are impossible in other breakout style games. This was how breakout was meant to be played on a touch screen device.CUTE CHARACTERSBattle 16 unique monsters with different personalities and abilities.POWERUPSOver ten different powerups including bomb balls, acid balls, fire balls, multiballs....just to name a few.5 EPISODES & 3 MODESEach episode has 9 unique rounds with new powerups and monsters.OBJECTIVESImprove your score by completing objectives and increasing your rank. See if you can earn the title of Block Belt and become a master.OPEN FEINT ACHIEVEMENTS & LEADERBOARDSPLAY IN 12 LANGUAGES

reviews.title: WAAAYY TOO SHORT
reviews.comment: For a game I bought I expected a lot more levels than only 4 chapters. Instead they make the 4th chapter ridiculously hard to play without constantly dying. Other than that though it\'s a great little game with a fresh take on block breaker and chalk ball style games. Just way too short in my opinion for a paid game. I have it installed months now and no new levels have been added except for a boring endless mode. PLEASE UPDATE AND ADD SOME NEW LEVELS TO PLAY.
reviews.author: Lucia Carpenter

reviews.comment: This game is so fun and addicting! I love all the monsters and their unique characteristics- especially the sounds they make! If you\'re on the fence, give it a shot! I sure don\'t regret it!
